Class CSVEnquiryRepository

java.lang.Object
com.SC2002.bto.repository.csv.CSVEnquiryRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEnquiryRepository, IRepository<Enquiry,Integer>
public class CSVEnquiryRepository extends Object implements IEnquiryRepository
CSV-based implementation of the enquiry repository. Follows the Single Responsibility Principle by focusing only on enquiry data access.
